entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
